description: Each week, guests and hosts on NPR's Pop Culture Happy Hour share what's bringing them joy. This week: A closer look at Sabrina Carpenter's "Espresso," the series Jamtara, and the movie Ghostlight.
title: What's Making Us Happy: A guide to your weekend viewing and listening

description: New albums by Don Toliver and LUCKI take opposite paths to the same calling, an understanding of rap as texture rather than text.
title: For a rising class of rap cyborgs, there's mastery in the mumble

description: Fresh off of Poor Things, director Lanthimos' three-part dark comedy about domination and free will feels like a lazy and self-admiring riff — punctuated by the occasional crude shock.
title: Yorgos Lanthimos exhausts his ideas, and his audience, in 'Kinds of Kindness'

description: “The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom” comes out Sept. 26. Nintendo just dropped a surprise trailer.
title: In upcoming 'Legend of Zelda' game, the titular princess takes center stage for the first time

description: Washington Post chief executive and publisher Will Lewis' pick to be its lead editor has withdrawn from the job. Robert Winnett of the U.K.'s Telegraph was scheduled to start after the U.S. elections.
title: After uproar over ethics, new 'Washington Post' editor won't take the job

description: CEO Robert Isom vows immediate action following the incident involving eight Black men on a flight from Phoenix to JFK, as well as other alleged accounts of racial discrimination toward passengers.
title: American Airlines CEO aims to 'rebuild trust' after Black men removed from flight

description: While some have fled Ukraine's second-largest city, others remain, even performing a classical music festival in defiance of the war.
title: Ukraine's Kharkiv has withstood Russia's relentless strikes. Locals fear what's next

description: A thrift shopper from picked up the vase at a store near her home in Washington, D.C. It wasn't until she went to Mexico that she realized she might have a piece of history sitting on her shelf.
title: D.C. woman returns thrifted vase — a priceless Mayan artifact — to its homeland
